title: Wut
body:
So I just had a game where:

We started out so far ahead
My first time Viktor
Score was like 20-4
3 people on my team had names of random letter and numbers
These 3 flashed and ulted whenever they were up, even in base
They also spoke another language
And at the end, after around 70 minutes of them refusing to push
They gave up and suicided

I just don't get why, your pour over and hour into a game then say "fuck it". I was trying to do stuff that game but I was the only one doing anything. Idc that I lost, just don't waste my time with this shit.
